body: Yeah this one was a bit confusing. Previously we were only setting `grad_fn` and leaving the `output_nr` as it was. To be able to get rid of `set_grad_fn` in favor of `set_gradient_edge()`, I figured the equivalent would be to get the `output_nr` from before and set it as the new `output_nr` in the gradient_edge. So I believe the net-effect is the same? And I think `set_gradient_edge()` is the better API everywhere else since it seems less reasonable to change the underlying `grad_fn` without changing the `output_nr` -- we'd rather use the concept of an `Edge`.
